original_text: There were also gifts that Samuel the prophet, Kish's son Saul, Ner's son Abner and Zeruiah's son Joab had offered to the Lord. Shelomoth and his relatives had authority to keep safe everything that had been offered to the Lord.
korean_text: 선견자 사무엘과 기스의 아들 사울과 넬의 아들 아브넬과 스루야의 아들 요압이 무엇이든지 구별하여 드린 성물은 다 슬로못과 그의 형제의 지휘를 받았더라

sentences.original_text: that Samuel the prophet had offered to the Lord
Kish's son Saul had offered to the Lord
Ner's son Abner had offered to the Lord
and Zeruiah's son Joab had offered to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 와 스루야의 아들 요압이 주께 드렸던 것들이었다

sentences.original_text: everything that had been offered to the Lord
